Heading: Unspecified – see text
Note: Restriction must be described in <SalesRestrictionDetail> (ONIX 2.1) or <SalesRestrictionNote> (ONIX 3.0)

Heading: Retailer exclusive / own brand
Note: For sale only through designated retailer. Retailer must be identified or named in an instance of the <SalesOutlet> composite. Use only when it is not possible to assign the more explicit code 04 or 05

Heading: Office supplies edition
Note: For editions sold only though office supplies wholesalers. Retailer(s) and/or distributor(s) may be identified or named in an instance of the <SalesOutlet> composite

Heading: Internal publisher use only: do not list
Note: For an ISBN that is assigned for a publisher’s internal purposes

Heading: Retailer exclusive
Note: For sale only through designated retailer, though not under retailer’s own brand/imprint. Retailer must be identified or named in an instance of the <SalesOutlet> composite

Heading: Retailer own brand
Note: For sale only through designated retailer under retailer’s own brand/imprint. Retailer must be identified or named in an instance of the <SalesOutlet> composite

Heading: Library edition
Note: For sale to libraries only; not for sale through retail trade

Heading: Schools only edition
Note: For sale directly to schools only; not for sale through retail trade

Heading: Indiziert
Note: Indexed for the German market – in Deutschland indiziert

Heading: Not for sale to libraries
Note: Expected to apply in particular to digital products for consumer sale where the publisher does not permit the product to be supplied to libraries who provide an ebook loan service

Heading: News outlet edition
Note: For editions sold only through newsstands/newsagents

Heading: Retailer exception
Note: Not for sale through designated retailer. Retailer must be identified or named in an instance of the <SalesOutlet> composite

Heading: Not for sale to subscription services
Note: Not for sale to organisations or services offering consumers subscription access to a library of books

Heading: Subscription services only
Note: Restricted to organisations or services offering consumers subscription access to a library of books

Heading: No restrictions on sales
Note: Positive indication that no sales restrictions apply, for example to indicate the product may be sold both online and in bricks-and mortar retail, or to subscription services and non-subscription customers. For use in ONIX 3.0 only
